devdoc.details: The L1 Cross Domain Messenger contract sends messages from L1 to L2, and relays messages from L2 onto L1. In the event that a message sent from L1 to L2 is rejected for exceeding the L2 epoch gas limit, it can be resubmitted via this contract's replay function. Runtime target: EVM

params._xDomainCalldataHash: Hash of the message to block.
Hash of the message to block.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params._message: Message to send to the target.
params._proof: Inclusion proof for the given message.

params._message: Message to send to the target.
params._proof: Inclusion proof for the given message.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._message: Message to send to the target.
params._newGasLimit: New gas limit to be used for this message.
params._oldGasLimit: Original gas limit used to send the message.
params._queueIndex: CTC Queue index for the message to replay.

params._name: Name to resolve an address for.

returns._0: Address associated with the given name.

params._gasLimit: Gas limit for the provided message.
params._message: Message to send to the target.

params._gasLimit: Gas limit for the provided message.
params._message: Message to send to the target.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: L1CrossDomainMessenger

constructor.notice: This contract is intended to be behind a delegate proxy. We pass the zero address to the address resolver just to satisfy the constructor. We still need to set this value in initialize().

relayMessage(address,address,bytes,uint2.notice: Relays a cross domain message to a contract.

relayMessageViaChainId(uint256,address,a.notice: Relays a cross domain message to a contract with L2 chain id.

replayMessage(address,address,bytes,uint.notice: Replays a cross domain message to the target messenger.

replayMessageViaChainId(uint256,address,.notice: Replays a cross domain message to the target messenger.

resolve(string).notice: Resolves the address associated with a given name.

sendMessage(address,bytes,uint32).notice: Sends a cross domain message to the target messenger.

sendMessageViaChainId(uint256,address,by.notice: Sends a cross domain message to the target messenger.
